247185.「ここ……黄昏の園じゃん！！\n アタシ いつのまに…………: This is... Twilit Field! When did I...?

247186.「そーだ！ あのヘンな本！\n アレをひらいたら 目の前が まっ暗になって\n:
Right! That weird book! I opened it, then
everything went black, and then... what
happened?

247187.「……にしても なんだろ この音。\n 鐘の音……かな？: ...But what is that sound? Is that... a bell?

247190.「やっぱ <pc>だ！\n よかったよ 会えて！:
I knew it was you, <pc>!
Thank goodness I found you!

247191.「アンタも あの ヘンな本をひらいて\n ここに 飛ばされてきちゃったワケ？:
Did you open that weird book and end up here,
too?

247192.「え……アタシだけ 昏睡状態……？: Huh... I'm the only one in a coma...?

247193.「なんてこったい！！ びっくりだよ！\n 今すぐ ショック死しそうだよっ！:
Oh my god! I'm in shock! I'm going to die of
shock!

247194.「あっ でも こっから脱出すれば\n フツーに 目覚めそうじゃん？:
Ah, but if we leave here, we'll just wake up
as normal, right?

247195.「なんにせよ 迎えにきてくれて ありがとね。: Anyway, thanks for coming to pick me up.

247196.「それとさ ここ出たら あのクソ野郎に\n お礼参りにいくから つきあって。\n:
And when I get out of here, I want you to come
with me so we can pay that bastard a visit.
I'm gonna make him pay!

247197.「えっ ギスマイヤーって 名前なの？\n 誰であろうと こんな目にあわせたヤツを:
What? His name's Gismeyer? Well whoever he is,
we can't let him get away with this, can we?

247198.「ボッコボコにしてやる！！: I'm gonna beat him into a pulp!!

247199.「ギスマイヤーめッ！！\n ブッころぉ…………およよぉ？\n ここ デズ師匠んち:
Gismeyer!! I'm gonna ki... huh? This is Master
Dezzie's house!

247200.「ありがと……アンタが モリナラ大森林から\n アタシの身体を 運んでくれたんだ:
Thanks... you carried me all the way from
Molinara Forest.

247201.「わたくしからも お礼を言わせて。\n ありがとう <pc>さん。\n ネリムち:
I wish to thank you as well. Thank you,
<pc>, for saving Nelim's life.

247202.「ねえ <pc>……\n 今 誰と話してんの？:
Hey <pc>... who are you talking to
now?

247203.「アンタってさ 誰もいないとこに\n 話しかけること……ちょくちょく あるじゃん:
You're always talking to someone when there's
no one around... Are you having ghost visitors
again?

247204.「<pc>さん 聞いてください。\n これまで 黙ってましたが……:
Listen to me, <pc>. I've kept
quiet about it until now, but...

247205.「じつは わたくし……幽霊なのです。: The truth is... I am actually a ghost.

247206.「アタシは ネリム。アンタと同じく\n デスマスターを こころざす者だよ。\n:
I'm Nelim. I've got my sights on becoming a
Death Master, like you. Nice to meet ya,
<pc>♪

247207.「デズリン師匠に 手紙で呼ばれて\n のこのこ やって来たものの\n ひとりで:
I came here by myself after getting a letter
from Master Deathlin, but I was worried about
being all alone.

247208.「そうそう デズ師匠ってば 自分で書いた\n 参考書まで 用意してくれてるんだよ:
Oh yeah, Master Dezzie even wrote her own
reference guide for us.

247209.「しっかし こんな本まで出してる\n デスマスターだなんて……尊敬しちゃうなぁ。:
But for a Death Master to put out her own
book... I have a lot of respect for her.

247210.「ちょっと <pc>！\n アンタ 誰と話してるのよ！？: Hey, <pc>! Who are you talking to?

247211.「えっ！ デズ師匠と いっしょに 幽霊さんと\n 話してたの！？ アタシが 寝て:
What!? You and Master Dezzie were talking to a
ghost!? While I was sleeping?

247213.「マジで？ 幽霊さん まだ そばにいるの！？: Really? The ghost is still around!?

247214.「わたくしが 幽霊であることは\n もっと あなたと 信頼関係を築いてから\n:
I was going to tell you that I was a ghost
after I established a stronger level of trust
with you.

247215.「幽霊に 弟子入りしろだなんて さすがに\n うさんくさくて 取りあってもらえな:
I thought that a ghost asking someone to be
their apprentice would be too suspicious for
you to accept, so I kept quiet... I'm sorry.

247216.「ほら！ ま～た 幽霊と話してる！\n いったい 誰なのよぉ！:
See? You're talking to a ghost again! Who is
it!?

247217.「はぁ！？ デズ師匠が幽霊……\n しかも ずっと 家にいたって…………\n い:
Huh!? Master Dezzie's a ghost... and she's
been in this house the whole time...? What are
you talking about?

247218.「ネリムちゃん こんにちは。デズリンよ。\n 今 霊界通話機を通じて 話してるわ:
Hello, Nelim. This is Deathlin. I'm talking to
you through the spirit world caller, so now
you can hear me.

247219.「いろいろ 混乱しているでしょうが\n 今は わたくしの話を 聞いてくださいな。:
I know you're probably confused about a lot of
things, but for now, just listen to what I
have to say. And <pc>...

247220.「すべては 死霊の書の継承者である\n ネリムちゃんを ギスマイヤーの魔の手から:
All of this was done to protect Nelim, the
heir to the Book of the Dead, from the
clutches of Gismeyer.

247221.「霊的なものから ネリムちゃんを遠ざければ\n 継承者は デスマスターだと 思い:
I believed that if I kept Nelim away from the
occult, I could hide her from Gismeyer, who
was looking for a Death Master heir...

247222.「そのため わたくしは 昔 幼いネリムちゃんに\n 霊感を封じる暗示をかけ あら:
For this reason, I tried to eliminate all
spiritual contact for the young Nelim by
sealing away her spiritual senses.

247223.「……幼いころって\n まったく 覚えがないんですケド。:
...I don't remember anything from my
childhood.

247224.「当然です。それさえも 忘れさせたのですから。\n しかし 暗示が うすれてきた:
Of course. I made you forget that as well. But
the seal I had placed was growing weak, so I
had called you here.

247225.「手紙で ネリムちゃんを呼んだのは\n わたくしの 目の届くところに置いて\n:
When I called Nelim here by letter, it was so
I could protect her by keeping her in my
sight.

247226.「そして <pc>さんを 呼んだのは\n 訓練なしで わたくしを認識できるほどの:
And I called <pc> because I knew
they had the ability to sense me without any
training.

247227.「修行しだいで 生前の わたくし以上の\n デスマスターになる可能性を 秘めてい:
With training, you have the potential to
become a better Death Master than I ever was
in life... you were my greatest hope.

247228.「すぐれた デスマスターでなければ\n 暗示をかけることも 解くこともできないの:
Only the best death masters can make or break
a suggestion. Even if I were to borrow your
body...

247229.「これから ネリムちゃんの暗示を解きます。\n 一度 ひらかれた死霊の書を 封印:
From now on, I will release Nelim's suggestion. Only Nelim, who has regained her inspiration, can seal the Book of Dead once it
has been opened.

247230.「そのためにも <pc>さん お願いです。\n あなたに 憑依させてください。あ:
For that reason <pc>, please. Let me
possess you. I can't use that art without
borrowing your body.<yesno><close>

247231.「暗示を解いたら すみやかに 身体を\n お返しします。ここは どうか わたくし:
I will return the body to you as soon as
possible after I release the suggestion.
Please trust me and let me possess you.<yesno><close>

247232.「ありがとう <pc>さん。\n では お身体を 拝借しますね……。:
Thanks <pc>. Now, I'll leave you to
yourselves...

247233.「ネリムちゃん……今 <pc>さんの\n お身体を借りて 話してるわ。あなたの霊:
Nelim- I am speaking to you now in the body of
<pc>. I am releasing the suggestion
that has been blocking your inspiration.

247234.「どうかしら ネリムちゃん。\n ちゃんと わたくしが見えるようになった？: What do you think, Nelim? Can you see me now?

247235.「うほぉおおおッ デズ師匠！\n そんな キレーな お姿だったのぉー！！\n な:
Master Des! You were so beautiful! And now
he's dead... how awful for God, isn't it?

247236.「あの……聞きにくいんだけどさ\n なして 死んじゃったの？:
Um... this is hard to ask, but did Sanashi
die?

247237.「死霊の書のゆくえを 追っていたころ……\n 書の封印解除をもくろむ ギスマイヤ:
When I was tracking down the Book of Dead I got into a fight with Gismeyer, who was trying to unseal the Book, and I was unfortunately
killed.

247238.「そんな！ ギス野郎のしわざだったの！\n あんにゃろー ボッコボコにしてやる！:
Oh, no! It was that lying creep's doing!
Anyaro, I'm gonna beat you to a pulp! I'm
gonna take down Master Dez!

247239.「感情に流されては ダメよ。\n あの男の デスマスターとしての能力は\n 生前:
Don't let your emotions get the better of you.
That man's abilities as a death master
exceeded mine in life.

247240.「危険な相手ですから しっかりと\n 準備をしてから いどむとしましょう。:
It's a dangerous opponent, so be prepared for
anything.

247241.「そのためにも <pc>さんには\n デスマスターの必殺技を 伝授したいので\n:
To that end, I'd like to teach <pc>
the death master's special technique, so
please give me a shout after this.

247242.「そうそう <pc>さんには\n お渡ししたい物があるので\n このあと 声をか:
Oh yeah, <pc> has something for you,
so please give me a shout after this.
